text: Vaping is like a toxic relationship. What are vape companies hiding? Despite what they say, vaping can damage lungs and make them more vulnerable to illness, including sickness caused by coronavirus. Kick it to the curb. It's not worth the risk. https://t.co/D3u0HvJqll
